Room.Name: Beach Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a path leading from the top of the cliffs to the southern beach.
Room.LongDescription: The path climbs the southern face of some very old and weather worn cliffs overlooking the Nylandian Bay. The top of the cliffs is perhaps another ten meters up, and the beach is spread out below. There's a good view of most of the bay from here. Down at water level there is a cold fog creeping in over the sand dunes, but you can see a road going to the east.
